name: Build an Onchain Game in One Hour with MUD
description: In this workshop you'll learn the basic concepts of MUD, a framework for ambitious onchain applications, by building an onchain game and deploying it to a network we've designed specifically for games and apps.

speakers.name: Alvarius
speakers.bio: Alvarius is co-founder and CTO of Lattice, where he is currently working on MUD, among other projects. Previously, he helped build the onchain Minecraft clone OPCraft.
